titleStmt.title: [A mery playe bothe pytthy and pleasaunt of albyon knyghte]
Albion, knight.

notesStmt.note: Title from Stationers' Register entry, A132r (ca. August 1565).
Known only from a fragment consisting of B1, its conjugate (presumably B4), and all of quire C. First line, B1r: Nay, I will taste of other assayes.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
B1, its conjugate (presumably B4) and quire C only.
